name: Deep Ones
description: Retro arcade-platformer with multigenre parts, inspired by ZX Spectrum, Bioshock and H.P.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit SP1 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.20GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: SyncMaster-4 (NVIDIA High Definition Audio) Additional Notes: Widescreen monitor recommended
